strategies.title: Default
strategies.description: For this strategy you alt. Focus on the gold notes, which you only hit with your RIGHT hand.
strategies.author: dumbarc

strategies.title: Right Hand alt
strategies.description: For this strategy you alt with 2 fingers on your right hand. For the notes you hit with your left hand, you could of course use 2 fingers instead of jacking if it makes it more comfortable.
strategies.author: dumbarc
